name: Castlevania_1_Remake
description:
This was made entirely out of fun. And to expand a bit of portfolio stuff for myself when it comes to code.

This little demo only features the "first stage" (Up til the first boss of the game). But I plan on updating it in the future to be a full release gradually. But for now this is just it.

This features:

- A controllable jump.

- Upgrades / Whip Power ups that will allow you to have an easier time with the game, IE: Negating knockback, Whipping in all directions.

- Classic Sub weapons you all remember, with minor tweaks. (For instance, I made the Cross Boomerang be able to be shot upwards and infront of Simon.)

Credits for everything are in the notepad file provided. But just incase for legal reasons:

Castlevania and all Rights are to KONAMI. I do NOT own any of it. This was out of fun and shits and giggles.

Please enjoy.
